title:
The Rescaled Dirac operator fDh and the noncommutative residue for
  6-dimensional manifolds
abstract:
In this paper, we compute the noncommutative residue for the rescaled Dirac
operator fDh on 6-dimensional compact manifolds without boundary. And we give
the proof of the Kastler-Kalau-Walze type theorem for the rescaled Dirac
operator fDh on 6-dimensional compact manifolds with boundary. We also give
some important special cases which can be solved by our calculation methods.
